programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.sub-title: My Husband Thinks I'm Hacking Our House
programme.desc: Husband accuses his wife of hacking the family.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Is a wife really secretly hacking her own family?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Today's guests are sick and tired of a relative's never-ending mooching ways! Will these extreme freeloaders learn to stand on their own two feet?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Revenge: The Good, The Bad, The Ugly
programme.desc: Headline-making revenge stories are examined.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Parents: How well do you know your teen? Could your daughter be indulging in harmful activities right beneath your nose? Anna says she was outraged when she discovered her daughter, Allie’s, secret addiction to prescription pills. Allie maintains that she’s been clean for four months, but Anna doesn’t believe her. She says the 19-year-old has been involved in three car accidents in the past seven months, and the police recently brought her home for erratic driving. Does Allie still have a problem with prescription meds? Will she agree to take a drug test? Then, 17 year-old Elizabeth wrote in to the Teen Talk forum because she says she’s leading a double life. She says her secret is eating her up inside, and she wants to confess to her parents. Find out what the young woman’s been hiding, and see how her folks respond when she drops the bombshell.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Craig and Cherie say the last half of their 16-year marriage has been anything but happily-ever-after. Cherie says Craig is chauvinistic, verbally abusive and demands sex, which she admits she only gives him about three to four times a year. Craig says Cherie withholds sex to control him, and as a result, he has become a slave to his anger. Cherie fears the tension in their household is taking a toll on their 11-year-old daughter, who is often caught in the crossfire of their fighting. Dr. Phil challenges the couple to a communication test. Can they heal their wounds and rekindle their romance? Then, meet the couple who inspired the movie, The Vow. Shortly after Kim and Krickitt Carpenter were married, a terrible car crash changed everything. Krickitt lay in a coma for weeks, and awoke with no recognition of her husband. The couple shares their inspiring, though oftentimes heartbreaking, journey of falling in love all over again. How did they find their way back to each other? And what is it like seeing their lives played out on the big screen? If you’ve ever wondered whether love can survive the toughest of challenges, you won’t want to miss this show! This show contains strong sexual content. Viewer discretion advised.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Alan says he's being falsely accused of a heinous crime, and his accuser is his own mother-in-law! She claims he molested his 3-year-old daughter. Who's telling the truth? Find out when Dr. Phil reads the results of Alan's polygraph exam. Can this family heal and move on?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Deborah was devastated when she went through her 17-year-old daughter, Miranda’s, cell phone and discovered a very disturbing photo. Miranda says she tried to tell her mom about her pregnancy but couldn’t bring herself to do it. Learn why Deborah says she was forced to turn her daughter in to the police, and how Miranda ended up in jail. Dr. Phil reaches out to the teen struggling to deal with guilt and loss, who faces backlash from a community she says doesn’t understand. Then, a family is torn apart after the father confesses the secret he’s kept for years. Find out why his girlfriend is now afraid for their 2-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Three wives send their husbands to Dr. Phil's Man Camp for an attitude adjustment.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: In the Dr. Phil House's Man Camp Edition, one husband is defiant, while others are reflective and one couple faces expulsion.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: In Part 3 of the Man Camp Series, couples fighting to save their marrages deal with family issues, infidelity, and unexpected visitors.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his work with three couples on the verge of ending their marriages.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Three couples trying to save their marriage continue their work at The Dr. Phil House.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Four months have passed since the couples moved out of The Dr. Phil House which marriages are thriving

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A mother defends her son caught in viral attack video.

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.desc: What happened to the victims of self-proclaimed FLDS prophet, Warren Jeffs?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A former FLDS spokesperson, Willie Jessop, comes face to face with critics.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: My Friend is Obsessed with Me
programme.desc: Traci says her former friend, Jinda, is obsessed and infatuated with her. Traci says Jinda began texting her about 50 times a day after they first met -- texts that soon became over-the-top proclamations such as, “I can’t get you out of my mind," and “I swear I will love you the right way.” Traci says she thought Jinda just needed a friend but then grew more uncomfortable as, she claims, Jinda was also inappropriately affectionate with her children, began texting her friends whom she had never met, and even tried to touch and kiss her. Traci claims Jinda crossed the line when she tried to sabotage her marriage, so she cut off communication with her. But is Jinda getting the message? Traci says Jinda still texts and drives by her house, and she worries what Jinda might do next. Jinda admits to being "needy and clingy" but does she see that she's overstepped her boundaries? Can Dr. Phil help her rein in her behavior? Then, Kari says her sister, Holly, stabbed her in the back when she took Kari’s ex-husband’s side during their divorce -- and, after not speaking for three years, she wants an apology. Holly says she’s not sorry and that Kari is the one who needs to apologize. Can Dr. Phil end the silence between these sisters?

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.desc: The role of the wife is explored.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Former guests who clashed over what defines a "good wife" return.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: The hot topic of what defines a "good wife" is debated.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Bloody attacks, arrests, mug shots and undercover stings - Dr. Phil explores these extreme outcomes of in-law conflicts. Meet two wives whose rocky relationships with their in-laws led to criminal consequences.

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.sub-title: I'm a Slave to My Spouse
programme.desc: Dr. Phil talks to controlling guests and the loved ones who feel trapped by them. Jeffrey hates that his wife of seven months, Mindy, goes out clubbing with her younger friends, who he says are a bad influence on her. Mindy leaves the kids with Jeffrey's 16-year-old daughter and parties until 6:00 a.m., while he works the night shift. Mindy calls Jeffrey “a warden,” and says if he had his way, she’d never leave the house. Then, Jason claims his wife, Terrie, is lazy. He says he has to clean the house, do chores, take care of the kids and balance two checkbooks! Terrie says her large chest and arthritis prevent her from doing household tasks. Can Jason get his wife to clean up her act?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.sub-title: Bad Boy Blake with Abs of Steel
programme.desc: Blake, 26, abandons his education to smoke pot all day in his mother's rent-free house, where he is verbally abusive and refuses to work.

programme.title: Dr.Phil
programme.sub-title: Get Out of My Family Tree!
programme.desc: A Mother-in-Law who spies on her son and 2 sisters fighting over the family will!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: The truth behind a toxic relationship between a student and professor.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: From the outside, Jason and Shani had the perfect marriage " a big, beautiful house on the lake and three adorable boys " but recently Jason was crushed to learn that Shani's been having an affair with a mutual friend. Now, Shani is torn between her husband and her lover. What would you do?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Is there an adult under your roof, eating your food and taking advantage of you financially? If yes, then you live with a moocher! It's time to stop the enabling and start the accountability.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Ben says his wife changed for the worse as soon as they got married; she says he is a narcissist and may be cheating on her.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A mother who is afraid of her 17-year-old son seeks help.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Do you know someone who makes big mistakes over and over? Dr. Phil gives his guests the wake-up calls they desperately need to stop repeating their destructive behavior.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: It's the invasion of the in-laws! Despite an intervention by Dr. Phil, a couple and their respective mothers still struggle to get along. See how Ernie and Kerry are doing, and what happens when their moms agree to set their differences aside and meet for coffee. Since the last show, Kerry says her relationship with her mother-in-law has never been better! Unfortunately, her relationship with her mother has never been worse. Then, Alaina and Ray are married with two children, and they all live with Ray’s mother, Eda. The two women are constantly at each other’s throats and it's threatening the entire family. Is this household too close for comfort, and will they be able to find a solution?
